name: linkedin-content-distributor
description: A system for creating and distributing LinkedIn posts within a company

scripts.migrate: node -e "const DatabaseMigrator = require('./src/config/migrations'); new DatabaseMigrator().migrate().then(() => console.log('Migrations completed')).catch(console.error)"
scripts.backup: node -e "const DatabaseBackup = require('./src/utils/database-backup'); new DatabaseBackup().backup().then(path => console.log('Backup created:', path)).catch(console.error)"
